title: Task 1: Describe visual elements of a work of art.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does not accurately describe one visual characteristic of the painted elk hide.
Response does accurately describe one visual characteristic of the painted elk hide.

title: Task 2: Describe contextual elements of a work of art.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does not accurately describe the function of the painted elk hide.
Response does accurately describe the function of the painted elk hide.

title: Task 3: Explain how context influences artistic decisions about form, style, materials, content, and/or function in the creation or meaning of a work of art.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does not use one example of specific contextual evidence to explain how the function or cultural context of the painted elk hide is reflected in its visual characteristics.
Response uses one example of specific contextual evidence to explain how the function or cultural context of the painted elk hide is reflected in its visual characteristics.

title: Task 4: Explain how an art historically valid interpretation of a work of art is derived from an analysis of its form, style, materials, content, function, context, reception, and/or meaning.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does not use specific evidence to explain why knowing the specific cultural context of the painted elk hide is important for understanding its meaning.
Response does accurately use specific contextual evidence to explain why knowing the specific cultural context of the painted elk hide is important for understanding its meaning.
